author: IGN
description:
Eevee appears in Pokemon Legends Z-A as a rare Pokemon hidden throughout Lumiose City. Here’s how to catch one and evolve it into the Eeveelution of your choice: Flareon, Vaporeon, Jolteon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon, or Sylveon!

#ign #gaming #pokemon
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A - Where to Catch Eevee and How to Obtain All Its Evolutions

author: IGN
description:
The battle system of Pokemon Legends: Z-A is pretty different from the standard Pokemon game. This time around, battles are real-time instead of turn-based! Between cooldowns, positioning, and more, there’s a lot to learn to master battles. In this video we’ll show you everything you need to know about the battle system!

0:00 Intro
0:29 Moving, Targeting, and Commanding
1:49 Cooldowns Instead of PP
3:34 Speed Works Differently
4:20 Long Range & Close Range Moves
5:15 Status Effects
6:06 Mega Evolution
7:14 Plus Moves
8:06 Extra Tips

#ign #gaming #pokemonlegendsza
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A Battle System Explained

author: IGN
description:
It’s a big scary world out there, but that’s never stopped us from a little extra thrill seeking on the big screen. But while a good horror movie can be scarier than the sum of their parts, others might feature memorable chills in otherwise not-scary films. And just how these moments terrify is different every time. So with this list we want to look at individual moments, from jump scares to the terrifying nonsense of existential dread and everything in between, we’re breaking down 10 different ways cinema scares your socks off. These are CineFix’s picks for the 10 scariest movie moments of all time.

This Movie List was written by Clint Gage and edited by Justin Donaldson

The Picks:

10 - The Jump Scare - Jaws (1975) dir. Steven Spielberg
9 - The Slow Burn - The Wicker Man (1973) dir. Robin Hardy
8 - Built on Terrifying Imagery - The Cook, The Thief, His Wife and Her Lover (1989) dir. Peter Greenaway
7 - Built on the Sound - Hereditary (2018) dir. Ari Aster 
6 - Scary Because of the
title: The 10 Scariest Movie Moments of All Time | A CineFix Movie List

author: IGN
description:
Ever since Resident Evil exploded onto the scene in 1996 and made inventory reshuffling in the face of a zombie outbreak popular, players have been regularly fighting down to their very last bullet. 30 years later, survival horror is the dominant format for those seeking video game scares, as popular now as it’s ever been. And with a fresh batch of nightmares to consider, there’s never been a better time to rank the best games of the genre.

From Silent Hill 2, to Alien Isolation and Outlast, here are our picks for the 10 best survival horror games of all time.

00:00 - Intro
01:21 - Clock Tower
02:37 - Silent Hill
03:55 - Resident Evil 7: Biohazard
05:14 - Outlast
06:17 - Alan Wake 2
07:42 - Amnesia: The Dark Descent
09:27 - Resident Evil
10:36 - Alien Isolation
12:00 - Silent Hill 2
13:28 - Where is Resident Evil 4?
14:22 - Resident Evil 2

#IGN #Gaming
title: Top 10 Best Survival Horror Games Ranked
